title: What program can I use to detect protections used on a program and its libraries?
content: What are some good programs that can detect which protection software has been used on or in other programs and their libraries?

answers_data.content: Also, try Detect It Easy. The project is alive and updated frequently.

You can try to use YARA with appropriates rules.
Or, if you're lazy, you can give a try to radare2, since it integrates YARA, and has a shitload of packer-related rules. You could also grab the rule files here.
I've found Protection ID to be fast and comprehensive (last update in late 2013).

There is no "best" I've used PEiD in the past which always worked pretty well.

http://woodmann.com/BobSoft/Pages/Programs/PEiD

comments.text: Please improve your answer by adding a link to the mentioned program.
